hero.title: Hi, I'm Sergio Martín García
hero.subtitle: Software
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions, especialized in React, Node.js and .NET, with experience in the development of desktop and web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a software developer, I started in the world of development in 2023 when I also started university, I graduated from the UTN - FRT in 2025. In the same period of time I started teaching programming to students of elementary level at the university, I had the opportunity to guide students with disabilities, in addition to teaching them programming I helped them solve problems and difficulties apart from their university life. In the year 2025 I started working at SAS, where I could apply my knowledge and learn new technologies. Having the opportunity to meet people who own small businesses and entrepreneurs who helped me grow as a person and professional.
